input: In the new Panchayati Raj Bill enacted in 1993, there are several fresh provisions deviating from the past. Which one of the following is not one such provisions?

options.A: A number of added responsibilities in the area of agriculture rural development, primary education and social forestry among other
options.B: Elections being made mandatory for all posts at the time they are due
options.C: A statutory representation for women in the panchayats, up to a third of the strength
options.D: Regular remuneration to the panchayat members, so as to ensure their punctuality and accountability

explanation: Provision given in option (d) is not included under 73rd amendment act 1993.
